description: An AI agent monitors sensor data from a semiconductor fabrication plant to predict equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules.  The goal is to minimize downtime and maximize production efficiency while adhering to strict safety and regulatory guidelines.
initial_goal: Minimize unplanned equipment downtime in the wafer fabrication facility by predicting and scheduling preventative maintenance based on sensor data analysis.
constraints: maintenance_window_constraints: must avoid peak production hours
enterprise_context: Semiconductor Manufacturing (specifically, a 300mm wafer fabrication facility)
